vulnerability.title: The Installed Operating System Is Vendor Supported
vulnerability.description: The installed operating system must be maintained by a vendor. Red Hat Enterprise Linux is supported by Red Hat, Inc. As the Red Hat Enterprise Linux vendor, Red Hat, Inc. is responsible for providing security patches.
vulnerability.recommendation: Review and remediate: The Installed Operating System Is Vendor Supported

triage_decision.reason: The finding verifies that the operating system is vendor-supported; remediation involves upgrading to a supported RHEL version, which is low-risk and does not affect authentication, networking, or filesystems.
